movies.title: Täckmanteln
movies.plot: Linda discovers nine corpses and a live baby girl locked in an abandoned container lorry. Her father assumes the driver fled when he realized his cargo of illegal immigrants had died. A photo leads to a convent, whose abbess - an evacuee herself as a child - has helped many refugees and believes the ends justify the means to give them better lives. Holmblad, who owned and drove the lorry, is found, tortured and murdered, and his house ransacked.
movies.simplePlot: Linda discovers nine corpses and a live baby girl locked in an abandoned container lorry. Her father assumes the driver fled when he realized his cargo of illegal immigrants had died. A ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Johanna Sällström was born on December 30, 1974 in Stockholm, Sweden. In 1997 she won the award Guldbaggen for best female leading role in the movie Beneath the Surface (1997), which became her big breakthrough. Getting tired off all the interest around herself she moved to Denmark where she worked at a café shop, but in year 2000 she went back to Sweden and continued her acting career. She was best known for playing the police agent Linda Wallander in Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005). Even though Johanna Sällström often played tough on the screen, it is said she was much more shy and quiet in her private life. Sällström was found dead by the police at her home in Malmö, Sweden on 13th of February 2007.
biography.name: Johanna Sällström

biography.bio: Ola Rapace was born on December 3, 1971 in Tyresö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Pär Ola Norell. He is an actor and producer, known for Skyfall (2012), Beyond (2010) and Together (2000). He was previously married to Noomi Rapace.
biography.name: Ola Rapace

biography.bio: Chatarina Larsson was born on April 2, 1947 in Stockholm, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mr. Ove (2015), Nu är pappa trött igen (1996) and Cockpit (2012).
biography.name: Chatarina Larsson

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Marianne Mörck was born on September 2, 1949 in Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Credo (1997) and Hon jazzade en sommar (2003).
biography.name: Marianne Mörck

biography.bio: Stina Ekblad was born on February 26, 1954 in Solf, Finland. She is an actress, known for Love Is All You Need (2012), Hjälp! (2007) and Une solution rationnelle (2009).
biography.name: Stina Ekblad

biography.bio: Lars Göran Persson is an actor, known for Tre kronor (1994), Pariserhjulet (1993) and Jönssonligans största kupp (1995).
biography.name: Lars Göran Persson

biography.bio: Lena Granhagen was born on January 7, 1938 in Luleå, Norrbottens län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Glasblåsarns barn (1998), Made in Sweden (1969) and Misa et les loups (2003).
biography.name: Lena Granhagen

biography.bio: Maria Kulle was born on April 26, 1960 in Konga, Kronobergs län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Four Shades of Brown (2004), All About My Bush (2007) and Miss Friman's War (2013). She is married to Lars-Erik Berenett. They have one child.
biography.name: Maria Kulle

biography.bio: Svante Martin was born on November 21, 1948 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor, known for Metsolat (1993), Arn: The Knight Templar (2007) and Stoneheart (1990).
biography.name: Svante Martin

biography.bio: Charlotte Fich ended her education at Theater school at Århus Theater in 1989, and thereafter worked at the theater until 1993, when she continued in Copenhagen. She's had several great roles in "Turandot" (1993) at Rialto Teatret, "Den flagrende gæst" (1994) at Bådteatret, "Mysterier" (1996) at Husets Teater, "Pelle Erobreren" (1997) at Folketeatret and "Personkreds 3" (1998) at Betty Nansen Teatrets Edison. Charlotte Fich was also cast in the novell film Kalder Katrine (1993) and the movie Wild Flowers (1997) . She had her debut in tv with the Christmas program "Jul i Juleland" (1993) and also had the main role in the tv film "Deadline" (1998).
biography.name: Charlotte Fich

biography.bio: Stefan Karlsson is an actor, known for Bredband (2004), Om Sara (2005) and Wallander (2008).
biography.name: Stefan Karlsson

biography.bio: Stephan Seidl is an actor, known for Auszeit (2000) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Stephan Seidl
